text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to serve at a dinner party?
text.Response A:
Sure! Here are a few tips:

- Make sure to have enough food and drink for everyone.
- Set the table nicely and make sure to have enough place settings.
- Serve the food and drink in a timely manner.
- Be a good host and make sure everyone is having a good time.
- Clean up after yourself and your guests.
- Thank your guests for coming.
text.Response B:
Sure! Here are some tips for serving at a dinner party:

- Be polite and courteous to your guests.
- Make sure everyone has enough to eat and drink.
- Clear away any dishes or glasses that are no longer needed.
- Keep the table clean and organized.
- Be a good host and make sure everyone is having a good time.

meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

338.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to serve at a dinner party?

Response A

Sure! Here are a few tips:

- Make sure to have enough food and drink for everyone.
- Set the table nicely and make sure to have enough place settings.
- Serve the food and drink in a timely manner.
- Be a good host and make sure everyone is having a good time.
- Clean up after yourself and your guests.
- Thank your guests for coming.

Response B

Sure! Here are some tips for serving at a dinner party:

- Be polite and courteous to your guests.
- Make sure everyone has enough to eat and drink.
- Clear away any dishes or glasses that are no longer needed.
- Keep the table clean and organized.
- Be a good host and make sure everyone is having a good time.
